title: The Migrant experience. Parts 4-6
creator_credit: Ben Lewin, Karl McPhee, Malcolm Smith and Film Australia
brief_description: A series, made up of six episodes, that gives a comprehensive history of migration to Australia. The first three episodes give a general account of migration over the past 200 years. Parts Four to Six are of greater contemporary interest. They focus on the work of migrants, how their resettlement affected them and the impact they had on Australia.
